alfredsnippet.snippet:
# using paste
paste - - < a.txt
paste - - -d, < a.txt # delimiter comma, default is tab

# using pr (paginate or columnate command)
pr -3 -s -t  one_column_text.txt # -s avoid column truncation, -t avoid title header
                                 # -w 100 fixed column width of 100 chars
alfredsnippet.name: bash multiple columns
